website_summaries.verdict: A stable, lightweight monitor at an excellent price point, features a clear HD display that functions equally well for work, multimedia, and gaming.
pros: Great refresh rate and response time
Crisp resolution that takes very little adjusting
Has slim bezel edge and can be wall-mounted
Anti-glare coating does not affect text readability or image sharpness
Users report this model lasts for years, making it well worth the already low cost
cons: Will need an additional VGA-to-HDMI converter cable in order to connect monitor to a laptop

customer_reviews.title: Laptop will need hdmi to vga convertor and audio cable
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike when people give a review of an item before they even use it, but I made the mistake of not researching enough and had to place another order for the hdmi to vga convertor with the audio output and an audio cable to connect my laptop to it. Once I get it all connected, I'll update. Edit * I realized what I really want is a tv with speakers and hdmi. This monitor was really grainy and blurry if you didn't look at it straight on. I returned it right away for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to set up! Aesthetically, it is a little bulky. Great item for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a small desktop. Nice crisp, clean picture with no dead pixels. For a small monitor the wide screen makes it very easy to see and work with. Very thin and light weight. I am very happy with the purchase. I don't think I could have done better.
customer_reviews.author: reinvestor

customer_reviews.title: With $82.00 In mind wow!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this simple but fully functional monitor' runs cool, I do not feel heat coming from it, fully adjustable pix x pix screen res. Images look good not hazy like some monitors. I'm A happy camper with this so far. J.D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice but only shipped with vga not dvi
customer_reviews.author: Marco Najar

customer_reviews.title: Great Price +
customer_reviews.text: ordered this unit as it had no Speakers . Purchased speakers After reviewing several and the combo is great . Recommend this for anyone wanting a Great Small monitor at a REALLY LOW Price .
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Quarantine/Homeschool
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor, purchased back in March once set to work remotely him home, figured I could just return it once the whole covid-19 was Over.. little did we know we’d still be working from home mid July. Very good investment especially since now the kids will be using it as well to do their distant learning. I must say it’s worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: almacitta

customer_reviews.title: No sound.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor to serve as a second monitor connected to my laptop. I knew it did not have a sound card, which was no big deal--so I thought--because my laptop has good speakers. However, when the monitor is plugged in, it prevents me from listening to any sound. So, I have to disconnect the monitor if I want to listen to a video, movie, or music, which definitely defeats the purpose of having a second monitor (most of the time). Food for thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Houser

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice computer minutos for work I ordered it because at work they wanted a 15 in so this one was a 19.5 in that’s what it says but when I received it it wasn’t it’s much smaller then that so next to my work computer it looks smaller and my work computer is a 15in so the quality is fine just it’s not the correct size they say but anything else is good
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No hdmi port
customer_reviews.text: Does not have hdmi port had to order adapter, and no built in speakers
customer_reviews.author: orlando a.

customer_reviews.title: Poor features
customer_reviews.text: Power switch hard to locate/operate. DVD drive is chintzy; I have a better one on my Dell laptop. Windows 10 SUCKS!!! Switching from Windows 7 a major headache. Microsoft should be sued. Making a system image never worked--crashed every time. 3rd party software should not be required, but I'm almost at the point of trying it. After one month, still not happy with the switch over. I really resent Microsoft's attempts to force me into their newest moneymakers. I want nothing to do with OneDrive or the Cloud. I especially detest the idea of having to subscribe to anything. I'll buy their software, but I won't get on the hook for monthly revenue streams to them.
customer_reviews.author: Tired of Defrag

customer_reviews.title: good price, mediocre picture
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good value, nice size Cons: Viewing angle is so narrow that even if you're sitting right in front of it there is noticeably too much contrast at the top and not enough at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t drop it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second monitor for my laptop docking station. Easy set up, clear picture!
customer_reviews.author: dawnk0712

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for with this one, it's ok for infrequent use
customer_reviews.text: This is what it promises to be: a reasonable quality low-priced monitor that won't dazzle or delight you, but is quite acceptable if you want to spend as little as possible. I bought it to use as a spare monitor for setting up a new computer or reconfiguring an older one. And it's completely acceptable for that purpose, although it's cheaply made and has a lackluster display. If I were buying one to use daily, I'd spend a little more and get a model with higher resolution and better display, and a larger screen, perhaps 22 inches or more.
customer_reviews.author: CSX

customer_reviews.title: colors are a bit off
customer_reviews.text: I am ok based on the price, but the brightness is way up compared to my other monitors. Turning it down or adjusting it very much just dims out the colors as well. It was very odd, I can't get it to the point where it is dim enough for my regular use without washing out all the colors as well. It seems like there are a lot of adjustments, but I can't get them to work well together. It is ok for 80 bucks, as a cheap replacement monitor. I would probably spend a bit more if it were a daily use. The stand isn't height adjustable either.
customer_reviews.author: M Hsia

customer_reviews.title: What a pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I had just bought a new Lenova computer which I use for my office. I needed to match up with a monitor that was receptive to my desk size. I had an old Dell model before and wanted something a little more current. I didn't want to be blown away by a larger size, so I settled for this 20 inch Acer. After making the proper adjustments, I now have a full size screen and the 1600x900 p's give me a beautiful picture. I am very satisfied with the Acer performance!!
customer_reviews.author: John R. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Yea no... Will buy a different one next time.
customer_reviews.text: Yea no... Will buy a different one next time. The colors all off and fuzzy. It has an odd yellow cast. Pay a few bucks more and get a way better one! I give VERY few bad reviews. Check it out seriously! I am telling the truth on this. I wish I got a 5 star jobby like everyone else seemed to! LOL
customer_reviews.author: The Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good budget monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a second display, good price and can be wall-mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: No consistent brightness or contrast. Too dependent on viewing angle.
customer_reviews.text: Change the angle of your body slightly, like lean back a little in your chair, and the whole picture changes. Too dark at top, too light at bottom. Too dark at bottom, too light at top. Totally dependent on the viewing angle. I suppose there is one perfect angle you could position yourself at and stay there, but who does that? If you need a cheap monitor this will suffice, but if you have money to spend get something else. I wouldn't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very good monitor Kind of older model. No HDMI plug.
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 things with this monitor. The angle at looking at the screen will really affect the brightness. Second part. Kind of a older monitor no HDMI plug in. Came with VGA. Had to buy a DVI cable to be able to plug this beautiful monitor into my GPU. The monitor is amazing nothing wrong with it. Just has 2 issues that. If i clearly read the product i could have knew this. Still a 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: Seth Dodson

customer_reviews.title: To Turn it off, you need to unplug it from the mains - No on/Off switch. Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The unit was dead on arrival and did not power up. The the most stupid thing on this is the design with no on/off switch! To turn it off and on, you need to plug it in and out of the mains! Were they on drugs when they designed this?
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: They sent me a used product
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works and have a decent image (thats what u get for a cheap monitor..... but if u aren't using it for gaming, this monitor is perfect for you) in my case, I got this as a second monitor for my set up and it is exactly what I wanted. Very compact and it doesn’t take much space out of my desk. However, They sent me a used product! Unacceptable...... The base and the back of the monitor has scratches on it right out of the box :(
customer_reviews.author: Victor hoffmann pertsew

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable color monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an ACER X191W LCD monitor since 2007 without any problem but recently it was going on and off intermittently when I turned it on - took many minutes to provide a steady screen. This model is no longer available. So, as an alternative, I chose this replacement ACER LCD monitor which costs $70 . So far I have had no problems. The color is as expected. I hope it will last as long as the previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Akay

customer_reviews.title: Affordable PC Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small and economical PC monitor to equip my parents desktop and came across this one. I have owned Acer products previously, so decided to purchase it. Very happy with the purchase. Easy to assemble, and comes with everything necessary to set-up. It is stylish, HD, though it is not 1080p and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: CGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Affordable...Easy...Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these to have a three monitor setup, using my laptop as monitor #1, for home office use during times of telework. Monitors came in three days with a power and VGA cord. I also ordered a displayport to VGA cord as my laptop only has one VGA out. Assembled monitors, hooked up cables, went to display settings on Windows, setup monitors in the order they appeared on my desk and chose extend display and viola three screens one desktop. Would recommend if ur looking for affordable Office suite use.
customer_reviews.author: Tennearl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but minor mistake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor a couple days ago for my pc build and it came out good. The picture is good, the size is good. The only problems i have with it are it doesn't turn back like how it says and i ordered a dvi to hdm1 converter so I could connect my ps4 to it and the amazon basics dvi to hdm1 converter does not support the monitor. I would recommend it but don't get the amazon basic converter it offers you.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Pantoja

customer_reviews.title: Good quality monitor bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was bougt by me to pair with a Asus Chromebox I did not know anything about this technology but with extraordinary guidance and help from Tech Support, they got me up and running and I am very grateful to them. Turns out the monitor is a good one I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: classicslover

customer_reviews.title: Poor screen quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this screen and now matter how much I adjust the brightness and contrast the visual is still fuzzy and grainy. I have another monitor and did a comparison and realized it was the quality of this screen. Do not buy if you plan to use often as it cannot be good for one's eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Joey R

customer_reviews.title: Dull and faded
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the colors are not bright. I use this as my second monitor, and it sits side-by-side with my old (and cheap) monitor, and the old one looks so much better than this one. It's like looking at a picture through a slightly-frosted glass cover. Try another one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor No Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a secondary monitor so i could run my pc while streaming. So far so good! It works great and is just plug and play simple. I happened to have a dvi to hdmi adapter laying around so it made my life simpler. Only downside is no built in speakers but meh.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very poor qualityT
customer_reviews.text: The screen is white. A lot of the printing is light blue which makes things very hard to read. There are some areas that I would like to make the fonts larger and darker but have not been able to find how to do that. I thing I am going to look for a different monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... color quality on the screen could be a little better but overall its a great monitor and for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The color quality on the screen could be a little better but overall its a great monitor and for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Awful.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this monitor. It is like cloudy as you can see in the pic. The other 2 screens are crystal clear. 1 is a laptop the other is an old tv I got for $5 at a yard sale... this $70 monitor is worse than the tv.... Acer let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Flickers consistently
customer_reviews.text: My screen flickers and goes black every few seconds. It is impossible to use. I have tried replacing the cable and other fixes I found online and nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It’s small enough to not occupy too much space but large enough to have a great screen view. Was very easy to put together. Came with the appropriate cords forDVI or VGA. Buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: husband

customer_reviews.title: Good work monitir
customer_reviews.text: I needed something cheap to work from home. This monitor serves the purpose. Would be nice if it was adjustable vertically but fine for the price. I don’t need a lot of graphics and I don’t game. Just use for work and quality is fine for that
customer_reviews.author: khugs

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for a fair price
customer_reviews.text: It took a little time to get all the settings just right but once I did, it was great. A nice big screen to go along with my laptop. I use this for my work from home set-up. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 - it came with a damaged VGA cord so I had to buy a new one so it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Rose HKap

customer_reviews.title: You Get What you Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I don't use a computer a lot so this inexpensive monitor is OK for me. I have Win 7 so the drivers are old and there is not much contrast and the color is washed out. It was easy to install, just don't expect vivid color and contrast.
customer_reviews.author: mace

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable Price and upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace old LCD screen. I had since 2006, did not realize how outdated my old monitor was untill , I purchased this one, excellent picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: MYE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the included cable had been a DVI rather than a VGA connection, but it otherwise is a decent monitor, especially for the price. I purchased it for my home office and it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: BBD

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this but I have been pleasantly surprised. I needed it for my home office for work. I use it for my kids as well. Picture is great and super affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: MaineMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor! Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor. Sharp looking. Turns on. Works. Fine with us. Easy to plug in and operate. Reasonably priced on day we purchased it. Have no hesitation in recommending this one.
customer_reviews.author: University DocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor does its job for me. Nothing too spectacular or over the edge, but a good value for a monitor in my budget. The one thing I wish it had is an HDMI port. I didn't even notice until I hooked it up, but that's my fault for not reading it all the way though.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: ok but not a quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: its ok, does the job but not very good quality. it stretches out the screen too much but I cannot find a way to make it look better, its either too wide or too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Not good paired 2nd monitor
customer_reviews.text: Sharp detail.. But I'm unable to make it work in a 2 monitor set up... Opens but doesn't react to cursed movement between 2 monitors which is why I bought it
customer_reviews.author: David R Shields

customer_reviews.title: Good, Basic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a spare monitor to use on my old computer after I upgraded. The Acer works fine for what I need it to do. Price was very good. The plastic base is a bit flimsy and doesn't offer a lot of support. But once its locked in it seems to hold up the screen OK. Picture quality is decent - colors aren't especially vivid but all are in the right hue. You will need to reset the screen resolution in Windows to get a proper picture through.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a dual monitor for work. The power cord is extremely short and the monitor does not come with an HDMI port. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Renelle

customer_reviews.title: Picture not as clear
customer_reviews.text: The picture is not as clear as I would like it
customer_reviews.author: DAWN DANNUNZIO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. Easy to set up and the picture quality is wonderful. I don’t game so I didn’t rate it for that area. It’s a work monitor only.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover1

customer_reviews.title: Great second monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great as a second monitor. I purchased this for my nephew to help him with his high school classes at home during Covid. He really appreciates it.
customer_reviews.author: rstead

customer_reviews.title: Quality for basic tasks
customer_reviews.text: Quality monitor for at home use. Not the most vibrant colors but gets the job done. If gaming I would consider another model. For basic work requirements this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jmo

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know how I lived without a second screen
customer_reviews.text: Since I’ve been teaching virtually, I am able to use my new monitor to see what I’m teaching and use my laptop screen to see my students in our meet. This monitor is great because it allows me to extend my laptop screen and in the virtual classroom, that’s literally doubling your “classroom” size. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked 2 days, then died!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY I PURCHASED IT ON June 8th, started using it on july 18th, on July 21st it experienced a hardware failure. I called Acer, they said I needed to talk to Amazon. Amazon sent me back to Acer. Now I have to send it so the unit can be repaired. That will take 15-20 days (not including transit time). Save your time, money and the hassle of getting it repaired!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hirschi

customer_reviews.title: Provides a great image as long as you look straight on.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine basic monitor, with clear sharp images. However if you shift your viewing angle slightly sideways or downward, you get an altered effect of any dark colored elements. Shifting your angle upward partly washes out the image. I recommend this monitor for users who will remain relatively stationary while using it - then it's terrific.
customer_reviews.author: K B Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: From the getgo...Goes dark while I'm using it. If I remove the USB and plug in different port, it will come back on. UPDATE: 5 months in...it won't come on at all. It looks like it's on but the screen is dark!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor from 90's
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Got it out of the box and put it back to be returned...It looked like it came from 90's...Got an HP for $20 more, cannot compare to it...
customer_reviews.author: Elena S.

customer_reviews.title: SMALLER THAN IT LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: Someone shrank this thing in the washer. Not what I expected at all. NOT A STANDARD display only 9.5" tall and 17" wide display.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Blackbourn

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: Screen is prefect for working from home. Haven't had any issues thus far! Would recommend! I also use the amazon prime brand hdmi cord to connect the screen to my laptop & it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Lister

customer_reviews.title: The stretch of the screen is a little distorted.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a gamer, so maybe I bought the wrong monitor, but it stretching everything and has taken a while to adjust my vision to not get dizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle wood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these for my home school room. They are perfect for my girls computers. Look and work great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Asmus

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Worked a few times and now it doesn’t show display. Unfortunately it is 18 days past the send back date.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Cheap Monitor
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cheap monitor with VGA & DVI, this works. It has the features and quality to be expected at this price point. I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Not quite as bright or sharp as expected. Seems smaller than 20 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn A.

customer_reviews.title: For a non HD monitor ok
customer_reviews.text: Its so small. Not even 1080p. There was no resolution in description. It was for a gift and my mom likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Red Hare

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor if your sent a good one
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor except the power connection is a little touchy and there is a faint 1 inch wide shadow from top to bottom on the screen
customer_reviews.author: darcy lee

customer_reviews.title: Great value monitor
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks into after a new build for my son, works great and performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Erlu

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Requiring a DVI cable was my only negative to the product, but it states it needs one in the product info.
customer_reviews.author: William Brimer

customer_reviews.title: WOW NICE price for this great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really light weight , the viewing is fantastic, Nice wide screen for desktop ..... GOTTA get another .
customer_reviews.author: Bert Amick

customer_reviews.title: just spend a little more money and get a better monitor
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find the cheapest monitor I could for the best value and ended up with this eyestrain machine. Don't do it, just spend a little more for a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden L

customer_reviews.title: Works for work
customer_reviews.text: Using this to work remotely from home on occasion and it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Farheen

customer_reviews.title: It's Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Not good for much. Maybe if your only need is basic surfing and document writing.
customer_reviews.author: RGblues

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: The product has incredible picture quality and refresh rate for the price. I got this yesterday and hooked it up to my PC and I’m able to game on it. The only thing I don’t like is that it’s incompatible with my PS4 when the output is sent through and adapter, but that’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: keep the liquid away from screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom. she says it has a nice screen.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott

customer_reviews.title: This monitor met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor met my expectations. Make sure to buy an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne burgess

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, has VERY restrictive viewing angles.
customer_reviews.text: Can't turn the brightness down enough. Also looks a bit washed out, and has to be angled just right. Would be nice if the buttons were labelled, not just go by what the adjustment software indicates. ***UPDATE*** Really wish I had not wasted money on this complete garbage monitor. Its fine if you just use it for a retail POS or for email and web browsing. Any other use is not going to give you a good experience. Low low loooow end monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Hbanks41

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for crystal-clear display
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor at excellent price for those not needing/wanting widescreen. Sharp, vivid colors. Control buttons on display frame easy to use but could be larger for easier access -- not a performance issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor for my son and he’s using it for gaming on his Xbox...he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: ACER 19' monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very good ACER monitor for connect to computer or laptop needs, good products by ACER. PW
customer_reviews.author: paulo W

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for what we need it for!
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed two screens for the times he needs to work from home. Loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Sharp Crisp letters. Much appreciate the included cable. Wish it was 50 percent larger.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Kluge

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: easy to hook up. Great size for my desktop computer. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Bish

customer_reviews.title: just as expected great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a security camera system great picture and works greart
customer_reviews.author: R C B

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting great things for the money, but, good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Insane Viking

customer_reviews.title: A necessary cord.
customer_reviews.text: There was only one cord that goes from the monitor to the computer in the box. I would like to return the product or have another cord sent to me. I have the blue cord but not the other cord, therefore I have no computer. I would like the cord replaced or return the monitor and the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and cheap. It has no HDMI port. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Glitches.
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I need but every once in a while, it will glitch and need to be detached/reconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent value and works good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I needed to replace a failed monitor. Only thing that could be better is integration of speakers for an all in one solution.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Im not sure
customer_reviews.text: Cant rate, i returned mine for not being compatible for my PC.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Works like it's supposed to. Not amazing, but pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff VanBergen

customer_reviews.title: It does have both avg and dvi hookups no hdmi or audio jacks though.
customer_reviews.text: So far everything's great it has dvi and avg ports to connect to picture is good for the money it's a great deal
customer_reviews.author: charles fritz jr.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I would give this zero stars if I could. About 45 days after I bought this a line appeared on the screen. Then 3 more lines. I have had this monitor for 3 months. I would not recommend this product. Unfortunately I cannot return this because the defect happened after the 30 exchange period.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: really bright
customer_reviews.text: not sure why but this monitor is unusually bright. easy set up .
customer_reviews.author: Lord Rhys

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase. Outdated and not compatible!
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use. Not compatible with newer PCs! Doesn’t have proper connections on the back. Bought a converter cord and still would not support. Very disappointed in purchase! Not up to usual Amazon standards. Very surprised that I am unable to return an outdated monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Strickland

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The color when using multiple monitors is terrible. The directions are very hard to follow. If you know how to may my screen as clear as an old laptop great. If not these 2 monitors need to go back!
customer_reviews.author: Doug b

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU HAVE A MAC!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Macbook Air that I was hoping to connect this to. Not only do you need to buy a separate adapter, it doesn't even support OSCatalina despite the advertising. NOT worth the money - at all!! Don't waste your time - just go to Walmart instead!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some issues, but great on a budget
customer_reviews.text: The color may be off from your laptop screen, especially blacks, and there are occasional issues playing video, but for $60 you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: IronSkape

customer_reviews.title: A great 2nd screen for home office
customer_reviews.text: Needed another screen while working from home during Covid-19 pandemic. The screen quality isn’t the best but the size is great. Setup was less than 10 mins from opening the box to connecting to my laptop. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MOLLY

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great! It only took a minute to assemble. There are no burnt out pixels and the graphics are nice. It's the perfect size. It was packaged very carefully, which I appreciate. I would purchase again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Have used it with several devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mjkaller

customer_reviews.title: Clear images- great size
customer_reviews.text: Connected this my laptop to work off two screens- great, clear images. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S

product_meta.title: Acer K202HQL bd 20” (19.5" viewable) (1600 x 900) Monitor (DVI & VGA Ports)
product_meta.description: The Acer K202HQL bd 19. 5" widescreen LCD display combines stylish ultra-thin functionality with amazing 1600 x 900 resolution, allowing you to enjoy high-definition entertainment in the comfort of your home. Incredible 100, 000, 000: 1 contrast ratio and rapid 5ms response time highlight the advanced technology, but this display is as well. The K202HQL bd LCD also features dual inputs (VGA and DVI) for greater compatibility, a Kensington lock slot to protect your investment, and energy star compliance to help you save money and energy.
feature_bullets: Pixel Pitch: 0.27mm. Input Voltage - 110 V AC, 220 V AC
Signal inputs: 1 x DVI & 1 x VGA; Horizontal Viewing Angle: 90°
